name: Salaam Baalak Trust- Mumbai

address: Care of P T Welfare Centre, Asha Sadan Marg

briefDescription: Salaam Baalak Trust, Mumbai (SBTM) is an organization that respects and supports the rights of street children and believes in offering choices.  SBT provides a holistic “safety net” of services to street children within an environment that is conducive to optimum development and to integrate them into mainstream society.  Towards this end, SBTM provides a range of services that includes education, shelter, nutrition and health care.  Since its inception, it has provided services to more than 10,000 children in Mumbai alone, with an annual average of 500-600 children. The number of beneficiaries in 2009-2010 was 505.

address: C/o P T Welfare Centre, Asha Sadan Marg
